QuestData.Title: Us or Them
QuestData.Description: In order to end the Ango'rosh threat, we must kill their leader, Overlord Gorefist. We'll do better than that, though. We'll make an example of the overlord and his followers.$B$BGo to the Ango'rosh Stronghold and deal with our foes. The stronghold is located in a cave on a small island to the northwest of Zabra'jin. You'll see a bridge made from a fallen mushroom beyond the Ango'rosh Camp.$B$BShow no mercy, $n. They certainly wouldn't spare any of us.
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill Overlord Gorefist, 10 Ango'rosh Maulers, and 10 Ango'rosh Souleaters and report back to Shadow Hunter Denjai in Zabra'jin.
QuestData.CompletionText: The threat of the Ango'rosh looms over us. Have you eliminated their leader?
QuestData.RewardText: Your victory over the Ango'rosh is to be celebrated, $N. I wonder how long it will be before those ogre brutes find themselves another bloodthirsty chieftain.$B$BNo matter, we'll be ready for them.
